name: Add item to the bag from section of items in current item's page, which price is less than 75$, check that items name and price from section page and bag are identical and check status, value of shipping progress bar and prices

steps.name: open home page
Close cookie consent banner, if visible
Go to 'Men's Jeans' section and close adverts modal, if appears
move to 'Men's' section
click on 'Jeans' inside 'Men's' section with waiting for presence ofd element
close modal with adverts, if appears
on 'Men's Jeans' page sort items from least expensive to most, scroll to first item, click on it, wait for url and close adverts modal, if appears
scroll to 'Low to High' radio an click
get text of first cheapest item from 'Men's Jeans' page after sorting
scroll to first item from cheapest, move cursor to it and click
wait for second item's url
close modal with adverts, if appears
move to size and click, then scroll to first, click on it and add item to bag
scroll to 'Size' button and click
scroll to first available size option inside dropdown and pick it
click on 'Add to Bag' button
get item's name from modal 'Added to bag' section
click 'View Bag' and wait for transition to cart
click on 'View bag' button
wait for url
get info about sub total, shipping cost, item's name, free shipping progress
scroll to item's info section
get text of shipping message
get shipping progress bar value
get shipping progress bar status
get text of max value cost for free shipping
get added to cart item's name
get added to cart item's sale price
get added to cart item's quantity
get sub total value
get shipping price
